title: Endurance: A Top-Down Sci-Fi Shooter
description: Endurance: A Top-Down Sci-Fi Shooter is a thrilling pixel game set on a mysterious starship. As a researcher on the ship Endurance, you must survive the zombie-like crew, unravel the eerie story, and rescue sane members to build your team. Packed with humor, horror, and nods to classic sci-fi films, this action-packed adventure awaits."
